name: Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml (Pack of 2)
summary: Achieve glass-like skin with the Rice Dewy Bright Face Wash, enriched with rice water and niacinamide to gently cleanse and deeply hydrate your skin. Available in a convenient pack of two 150 ml bottles.

name: Rice Facial Kit With Rice Water & Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 60 g
description: Salon-Like Glow in 6 Steps | Improves Skin Texture
summary: Achieve a salon-like glow with the Rice Facial Kit, featuring rice water and niacinamide to enhance skin texture and provide a glass skin finish in just six steps.

name: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti & Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control & Acne - 100 ml
summary: Experience refreshed, balanced skin with our Multani Mitti Face Wash, enriched with Multani Mitti and Bulgarian Rose to control oil and acne while promoting hydration.

name: Rice Water Dewy Face Toner with 96% Pure Rice Water Extract & 4% Niacinamide for Glass Skin - 150 ml
description: Gives Dewy Glass-Like Glow | Intensely Hydrates | Minimizes Pores | Evens Out Skin Tone
summary: Achieve a dewy, glass-like glow with this Rice Water Dewy Face Toner, featuring 96% pure rice water extract and 4% niacinamide to intensely hydrate, minimize pores, and even out skin tone.

name: Multani Mitti Face Wash with Multani Mitti & Bulgarian Rose For Oil Control & Acne - 100 ml
summary: The Multani Mitti Face Wash combines the natural goodness of Multani Mitti and Bulgarian Rose to effectively control oil and acne while promoting skin hydration, making it perfect for a clear and refreshed complexion.
